thread.title: Guantanamo Bay Here are the results
thread.title_full: Guantanamo Bay Map Game: Here are the results - The Denver Post

author: Joe Murphy
title: Guantanamo Bay Here are the results
text:
You may be forgiven by your friends for not knowing the precise location of Guantanamo Bay, but that's only because now you know . To the 7.6% who got it exactly right, well done. To the additional 8.9% who were within five miles, you're okay, this was a hard game. For those who haven't played the game, play it here .
Here are the results, in map-form. Zoom out and you'll see how bad it gets.
On mobile? View the map here
